catch_copy: Pit your wits against the Devil!!
copyright_text:
©Konami Digital Entertainment
Arcade Archives Series Produced by HAMSTER Corporation

This product is distributed by HAMSTER Corporation and has been licensed for use in agreement with Konami Digital Entertainment Co., Ltd.
description:
"LABYRINTH RUNNER" is a shooting game released by KONAMI in 1988.
You set off on a journey towards the castle where the evil Devil awaits, in order to rescue the kidnapped Princess Papaya.
Be wary of the various traps along the way, and use three types of projectiles to defeat enemies appearing from all directions as you advance!

The “Arcade Archives”series is developed with the concept of faithfully reproducing classic arcade games. It also includes convenient features such as difficulty and screen settings, rewind, rapid-fire, and multiple save slots. In addition, players can compete for the best scores with players around the world through online rankings.
“Arcade Archives 2” adds a new “TIME ATTACK MODE” to the lineup of “ORIGINAL MODE,” “HI SCORE MODE,” and “CARAVAN MODE” included in the Arcade Archives series. In “TIME ATTACK MODE,” players compete to clear the game as quickly as possible, regardless of the score achieved. VRR (Variable Refresh Rate) support has also been added, allowing gameplay to be reproduced even closer to the original arcade experience.
Please enjoy these iconic arcade games that defined an era with the “Arcade Archives” series!

*The options menu and manual are available in Japanese, English, French, German, Italian, and Spanish.

notices.text:
*This product can only be played on Nintendo Switch™ 2.
In addition to this product, there is also Nintendo Switch™ "Arcade Archives LABYRINTH RUNNER ".  There is no compatibility between this product and the save data or additional content of "Arcade Archives LABYRINTH RUNNER ". Please be careful not to purchase duplicates or the wrong product.
*If you have purchased Nintendo Switch™ "Arcade Archives LABYRINTH RUNNER," you will be able to purchase Nintendo Switch™ 2 "Arcade Archives 2 LABYRINTH RUNNER " as part of a "Game Owner Discount" service.
